verbs.description: audrey wells under the tuscan sun and [ARG1: the hate] [ARG0: u] [V: give] [ARG2: writer] dies at 58 screenwriter and director audrey wells died on thursday after a long and private battle with cancer according to her representatives at united talent agency she was 58 years old wells had a long and celebrated career in hollywood penning such films as under the tuscan sun which she also directed as well as the truth about cats and dogs the kid shall we dance and the hate u give which was released on friday by fox over the tuscan sun uc berkeley starr carter audrey wells audrey david kramer director feminist majority foundation tuscan tatiana brian larky uta writer ucla united talent agency hollywood tajči
